name: The Phototroph
description:
The Phototroph

A psychedelic space exploration game about a light-eating creature, featuring dynamic acid house music made with Acid Machine

WASD to move
Create ORBS by collecting light
Tap SPACE to use up an orb to jump
HOLD SPACE to do a GRAVITY DIVE towards the nearest gravity object

!! DOWNLOAD FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE !!

Ludum Dare 39 voting page
